pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.2: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi—“icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave, temāsaṃ paṭisallīyituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.3: Namhi kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo, aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakenā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.4: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā nāssudha koci bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamati, aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.5: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyā saṃghena katikā katā hoti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.7: Na bhagavā kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo, aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.8: Yo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamati so pācittiyaṃ desāpetabbo”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.9: Atha kho āyasmā upaseno vaṅgantaputto, sapariso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.10: Āciṇṇaṃ kho panetaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ paṭisammodituṃ. Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ upasenaṃ vaṅgantaputtaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.14: Appakilamathena ca mayaṃ, bhante, addhānaṃ āgatā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.15: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmato upasenassa vaṅgantaputtassa saddhivihāriko bhikkhu bhagavato avidūre nisinno hoti. Atha kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.19: “Upajjhāyo me, bhante, paṃsukūliko. Evaṃ ahampi paṃsukūliko”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.20: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ upasenaṃ vaṅgantaputtaṃ etadavoca—“pāsādikā kho tyāyaṃ, upasena, parisā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.22: “Yo maṃ, bhante, upasampadaṃ yācati tamahaṃ evaṃ vadāmi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.24: Sace tvampi āraññiko bhavissasi piṇḍapātiko paṃsukūliko, evāhaṃ taṃ upasampādessāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.25: Sace me paṭissuṇāti upasampādemi, no ce me paṭissuṇāti na upasampādemi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.26: Yo maṃ nissayaṃ yācati tamahaṃ evaṃ vadāmi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.28: Sace tvampi āraññiko bhavissasi piṇḍapātiko paṃsukūliko, evāhaṃ te nissayaṃ dassāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.29: Sace me paṭissuṇāti nissayaṃ demi, no ce me paṭissuṇāti na nissayaṃ demi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.1.30: Evaṃ kho ahaṃ, bhante, parisaṃ vinemī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.1: “Sādhu sādhu, upasena. Sādhu kho tvaṃ, upasena, parisaṃ vinesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.2: Jānāsi pana tvaṃ, upasena, sāvatthiyā saṃghassa katikan”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.3: “Na kho ahaṃ, bhante, jānāmi sāvatthiyā saṃghassa katikan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.6: Na bhagavā kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo, aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.7: Yo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamati so pācittiyaṃ desāpetabbo’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.9: na mayaṃ apaññattaṃ paññapessāma paññattaṃ vā na samucchindissāma,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.12: apaññattaṃ na paññapetabbaṃ, paññattaṃ vā na samucchinditabbaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.14: Anujānāmi, upasena, ye te bhikkhū āraññikā piṇḍapātikā paṃsukūlikā yathāsukhaṃ maṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamantū”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.15: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitā honti—“mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ upasenaṃ vaṅgantaputtaṃ pācittiyaṃ desāpessāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.16: Atha kho āyasmā upaseno vaṅgantaputto sapariso uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.17: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ upasenaṃ vaṅgantaputtaṃ etadavocuṃ—“jānāsi tvaṃ, āvuso upasena, sāvatthiyā saṃghassa katikan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.18: “Bhagavāpi maṃ, āvuso, evamāha—‘jānāsi pana tvaṃ, upasena, sāvatthiyā saṃghassa katikan’ti? ‘Na kho ahaṃ, bhante, jānāmi sāvatthiyā saṃghassa katikan’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.21: Na bhagavā kenaci upasaṅkamitabbo, aññatra ekena piṇḍapātanīhārakena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.22: Yo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamati so pācittiyaṃ desāpetabbo’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.24: na mayaṃ apaññattaṃ paññapessāma paññattaṃ vā na samucchindissāma,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.26: Anuññātāvuso, bhagavatā—‘ye te bhikkhū āraññikā piṇḍapātikā paṃsukūlikā yathāsukhaṃ maṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamantū’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.27: Atha kho te bhikkhū—“saccaṃ kho āyasmā upaseno āha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.2.28: ‘na apaññattaṃ paññapetabbaṃ, paññattaṃ vā na samucchinditabbaṃ, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattitabban’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.3.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū—“anuññātā kira bhagavatā—‘ye te bhikkhū āraññikā piṇḍapātikā paṃsukūlikā yathāsukhaṃ maṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamantū’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.3.2: Te bhagavantaṃ dassanaṃ pihentā santhatāni ujjhitvā āraññikaṅgaṃ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ samādiyiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.3.3: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ senāsanacārikaṃ āhiṇḍanto addasa santhatāni tahaṃ tahaṃ ujjhitāni.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.3.4: Passitvā bhikkhū āmantesi—“kassimāni, bhikkhave, santhatāni tahaṃ tahaṃ ujjhitānī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.3.5: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.3.6: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.3.7: “tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmi dasa atthavase paṭicca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.3.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.3.10: “Nisīdanasanthataṃ pana bhikkhunā kārayamānena purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthi ādātabbā dubbaṇṇakaraṇāya,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:1.3.11: anādā ce bhikkhu purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ kārāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.10: thirabhāvāya vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā chinditvā ekadese vā santharitabbaṃ vijaṭetvā vā santharitabbaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.11: Anādā ce bhikkhu purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthinti
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.12: anādiyitvā purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.14: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā puggalassa vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.17: “idaṃ me, bhante, nisīdanasanthataṃ anādiyitvā purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ kārāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.22: Attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.23: Attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.24: Parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.25: Parehi vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.26: Aññassatthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np15:2.32: vitānaṃ vā bhūmattharaṇaṃ vā sāṇipākāraṃ vā bhisiṃ vā bibbohanaṃ vā karoti,
